verbose_text: Specific examples of DNA methylation role in cancers include hypermethylation of BRCA1 in breast and ovarian cancer [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR]; DOK7 in breast cancer [XREF_BIBR]; MYOD1 in hematological neoplasm; APC, HOX2, OTX1 genes in non small cell lung carcinoma (NSCLC) [XREF_BIBR]; FEN1 in breast tumor cells [XREF_BIBR]; and hypomethylation of TKTL1 in head and neck squamous cell carcinoma [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: hypermethylation of BRCA1 in breast and ovarian cancer [ XREF_BIBR , XREF_BIBR ]; DOK7
